languages.text: "Сестра Арджента, подле меня ты непрестанно кутаешься в зеленовато-серый туман. Тебя тревожу я? Или то, что я могу за ним разглядеть?"
"Sister Argenta, you are always shrouded in a greenish-grey mist when I see you. Is it me that troubles you? Or is it whatever I can see behind it?"
languages.original_text: "Сестра Арджента, подле меня ты непрестанно кутаешься в зеленовато-серый туман. Тебя тревожу я? Или то, что я могу за ним разглядеть?"

traits.locale_text: "Sister Argenta, you are always shrouded in a greenish-grey mist when I see you. Is it me that troubles you? Or is it whatever I can see behind it?"
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Sister Argenta, you are always shrouded in a greenish-grey mist when I see you. Is it me that troubles you? Or is it whatever I can see behind it?"
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: “阿洁塔修女，每次见到你，我都看到你的身上笼罩着一层暗绿色的迷雾。是我让你感到讨厌吗？还是那层迷雾背后的东西让你不安？”
languages.original_text: "Sister Argenta, you are always shrouded in a greenish-grey mist when I see you. Is it me that troubles you? Or is it whatever I can see behind it?"

traits.locale_text: “阿洁塔修女，每次见到你，我都看到你的身上笼罩着一层暗绿色的迷雾。是我让你感到讨厌吗？还是那层迷雾背后的东西让你不安？”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: « Sœur Argenta, vous êtes toujours entourée d'une sorte de brume gris verdâtre quand je vous vois. Est-ce moi qui vous trouble ainsi ? Ou ce que j'aperçois derrière ? »
languages.original_text: "Sister Argenta, you are always shrouded in a greenish-grey mist when I see you. Is it me that troubles you? Or is it whatever I can see behind it?"

traits.locale_text: « Sœur Argenta, vous êtes toujours entourée d'une sorte de brume gris verdâtre quand je vous vois. Est-ce moi qui vous trouble ainsi ? Ou ce que j'aperçois derrière ? »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Schwester Argenta, wann immer ich Euch sehe, seid Ihr in einen grün-grauen Nebel gehüllt. Bin ich es, die Euch so beunruhigt? Oder das, was ich dahinter sehen kann? Was auch immer das sein mag ..."
languages.original_text: "Sister Argenta, you are always shrouded in a greenish-grey mist when I see you. Is it me that troubles you? Or is it whatever I can see behind it?"

traits.locale_text: "Schwester Argenta, wann immer ich Euch sehe, seid Ihr in einen grün-grauen Nebel gehüllt. Bin ich es, die Euch so beunruhigt? Oder das, was ich dahinter sehen kann? Was auch immer das sein mag ..."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: 「シスター・アルジェンタ、あなたはいつも緑がかった灰色の霧に包まれている。あなたを悩ませてるのは私なのですか？それとも、背後に見えるもの？」
languages.original_text: "Sister Argenta, you are always shrouded in a greenish-grey mist when I see you. Is it me that troubles you? Or is it whatever I can see behind it?"

traits.locale_text: 「シスター・アルジェンタ、あなたはいつも緑がかった灰色の霧に包まれている。あなたを悩ませてるのは私なのですか？それとも、背後に見えるもの？」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: «Hermana Argenta, siempre que la veo le rodea una neblina de gris verdoso. ¿Le preocupa mi presencia, o es lo que puedo ver?».
languages.original_text: "Sister Argenta, you are always shrouded in a greenish-grey mist when I see you. Is it me that troubles you? Or is it whatever I can see behind it?"

traits.locale_text: «Hermana Argenta, siempre que la veo le rodea una neblina de gris verdoso. ¿Le preocupa mi presencia, o es lo que puedo ver?».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.original_text: "Sister Argenta, you are always shrouded in a greenish-grey mist when I see you. Is it me that troubles you? Or is it whatever I can see behind it?"

languages.text: "Rahibe Argenta, seni ne zaman görsem yeşilimsi gri bir sis kaplamış oluyor. Benden mi rahatsız oluyorsun yoksa ardında gördüklerimden mi?"
languages.original_text: "Sister Argenta, you are always shrouded in a greenish-grey mist when I see you. Is it me that troubles you? Or is it whatever I can see behind it?"

traits.locale_text: "Rahibe Argenta, seni ne zaman görsem yeşilimsi gri bir sis kaplamış oluyor. Benden mi rahatsız oluyorsun yoksa ardında gördüklerimden mi?"
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion
